content:
The chunk is part of a graphical user interface (GUI) implementation in a Python application, specifically setting up buttons within a "Resample Frame" to perform path resampling operations. The buttons provide functionality to apply timewarp for constant velocity (`Make Even`) and compute HPR curves for proper orientation (`Face Forward`).

frame = tk.Frame(resampleFrame)
        self.createButton(
            frame, 'Resample', 'Make Even',
            'Apply timewarp so resulting path has constant velocity',
            self.makeEven, side = tk.LEFT, fill = tk.X, expand = 1)
        self.createButton(
            frame, 'Resample', 'Face Forward',
            'Compute HPR so resulting hpr curve faces along xyz tangent',
            self.faceForward, side = tk.LEFT, fill = tk.X, expand = 1)
        frame.pack(fill = tk.X, expand = 0)
        resampleFrame.pack(fill = tk.X, expand = 0, pady = 2)
